title: Integrated Strategy for Sustainability and Organizational Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of organizational operations and language education
context.additional_context: A course focusing on helping practicing professionals understand the three dimensions of sustainability (economic, environmental, social) in language education and strengthening organizational learning capabilities

learning_goals: Learners can explain the three core elements of sustainability (economic, environmental, and social) and analyze their connection to organizational learning.
Through literature analysis, learners can evaluate sustainability-related cases, apply critical thinking, and propose improvement strategies.
Utilizing the characteristics of organizational learning, learners can establish practical strategies to achieve sustainability goals.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
